short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An amazing image slideshow gadget for your Chromebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An amazing image slideshow gadget for your Chromebook, This allows you to set your favorite photos sliding on screen while allowing you to set them as Chromebook Wallpaper.
Select local folder with your favorite images and you are done. Completely offline

New in v1.4:
 ■ Auto change wallpaper
 ■ Shuffle images

What's New:
 ■ Select Multiple Gallery Directories
 ■ Load on System Startup
 ■ Select Picture Size (Crop to Cover app screen / Fit to screen)
 ■ Choose Picture change interval
 ■ Preview gallery images
 ■ Pin always On Top
 ■ Expand to Full Screen
